item.title: flutter安装和运行
item.description: 1.创建flutter工程目录（各项目+flutter目录），在flutter 目录下载flutter SDK 1 2 git init git clone -b dev https://github.com/flutter/flutter.git 2.进入flutte

item.title: flutter创建工程报错
item.description: 1.问题 在使用 flutter create命令创建flutter工程时，如果报`Cannot create a project within the Flutter SDK. Target directory ‘/Users/ksnowlv/Music/flutter/flutter/my_app’ is within the Flutter SDK at ‘/Users/k
